resources.string:
What is SleepEZ? 
 
 This is an app to help users build better sleep habits by providing useful tools to track and analyze personal sleep data. 
 
 Activity Options 
 
   ● The New Sleep activity allows you to input new sleep data 
 
   ● The Statistics activity allows you to view data about your sleep in multiple ways 
 
   ● The My Goals activity allows you to set new goals and keep track of progress
